name: Sensible World of Soccer 2021-2
overview: Sensible World of Soccer 2021/2 is a feature-packed version of Sensible Soccer that is sure to be enjoyed by gamers of any age! For those of you who love playing on the Commodore Amiga, you'll also be pleased to know league and competition structure of 96/97 has been maintained to be compatible with real Amiga machines, and even though HDF/WHDLOAD versions are available with slightly edited in-game graphics, and updated teams, the database has been updated to 21/22, career mode is working, the year has been set to 21/22 and the HDF requires at least an Amiga 600/1200 and 4 MB Fastram!
